summary: December 20 is the 354th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Brian Hanrahan  had a long and distinguished career as a BBC Television News Correspondent at home and abroad, ending up as the Diplomatic Editor for BBC News. In addition he had spells presenting The World at One on BBC Radio Four and on the rolling news channel BBC News 24. He is best remembered for his coverage of the Falklands War of 1982.
^ 
^ Notice of Brian Hanrahan's death
title: Brian Hanrahan
